name: Child of Nature
description:
Sorry, no UI. Time mismanagment is no joke.
"A" "D" or "<-" "->" move Left and Right respectively
"SPACEBAR" is to Jump

"Q" is for Leaf Spell

"W" is for Waterdrop Spell

"E" is for Sunbeam Spell

"R" is for boulder Spell

"Tab" is to cast spells

Casting: first input corresponding button then press "Tab"

e.g. "W" + "Tab" will produce a waterdrop. 

Game starts with no spells, but you will aquire all of them through the course of the game. 

Made by Ratatatataskr, SirWhaleWay, Himisir for Brackey GameJam 2023.1
